meanings.definition: The quality or state of being surreal.
meanings.sent1: The surreality of the dream made it hard to distinguish reality from fantasy.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the surreality of the painting with vibrant colors and distorted shapes.
meanings.sent3: The surreality of the situation left everyone laughing at the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of surreality, where logic and imagination intertwined.
meanings.sent5: The movie created a world of surreality where anything was possible.
